Detailed Description

CmdInsertMaterial class is the insert command for materials stored in the command stack.

CmdInsertShape represents a single material insertion action on a scene, insert a new material node to the scene.

Definition at line 53 of file CmdInsertMaterial.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CmdInsertMaterial::CmdInsertMaterial ( TShapeKit *  shapeKit,
TMaterial *  material,
SceneModel *  model,
QUndoCommand *  parent = 0 
)

Creates a new material insert command that adds a material to shapekit node in the model.

If parent is not null, this command is appended to parent's child list and then owns this command.

Member Function Documentation

void CmdInsertMaterial::redo (  ) [virtual]

Applies a change to the model. After redo() the model will contain new material node located as shapekit type node child.

See also:
undo().

Definition at line 81 of file CmdInsertMaterial.cpp.

References SceneModel::InsertCoinNode(), m_material, m_pModel, m_row, and m_shapeKit.

void CmdInsertMaterial::undo (  ) [virtual]

Reverts model state. After undo() is called, the shapekit node will not contain a material type node.

See also:
redo().
